segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of frustration watching that boy climb on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to tipping over, and yet he seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, so absorbed in her chores, is missing all the signs of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl’s hopeful posture lightens the mood, even if it's underhanded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder how often we get so caught up in our routines that we miss the bigger picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the mess that will ensue if that stool goes down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s one big disaster waiting to happen, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
